definition: mortise (slot cut into wood to receive a tenon)/4th earthly branch: 5-7 a.m., 2nd solar month (6th March-4th April), year of the Rabbit/ancient Chinese compass point: 90° (east)/variant of 鉚|铆[mao3]/to exert one's strength
bored to death (idiom)/bored stiff/overcome with boredom
The people have no way to make a living (idiom, from Record of the Grand Historian 史記|史记[Shi3 ji4])/no way of getting by
to find some consolation (idiom)/to find relief in
Strange Stories from a Chinese Studio, Qing dynasty book of tales by 蒲松齡|蒲松龄[Pu2 Song1 ling2]
erhua variant of 聊天[liao2 tian1]
to earn a living (esp. with negative)

sentences.english: Can I invite Mr. Simpson over for a chat?
sentences.chinese: 我能不能邀幸普森先生聊一會兒？

sentences.english: Horace and the Gorgons gossip on the horrible Halloween.
sentences.chinese: 赫拉斯和蛇發女怪三姐妹在可怕的萬聖節前夕聊八卦。

sentences.english: I haven't seen her in months. I really miss talking to her.
sentences.chinese: 我有好幾個月沒見她了，真想跟她聊一會兒。

sentences.english: We discuss except military, we always talk about anything.
sentences.chinese: 我們除了聊軍事幾乎無話不說。

sentences.english: Today's chat will be the guest Lin and I co-chaired the East.
sentences.chinese: 今天的嘉賓聊天將由我和東林共同主持。

sentences.english: The cloud poor business conditions are occasionally light smile, they chatted many, I did not know world.
sentences.chinese: 偶爾雲淡風輕得笑笑，他們聊了很多，我不知的世界。

sentences.english: I chat with friends while walking.
Sister May and Me still going on.
We had a quite long interview, which I thought was actually pretty good.
sentences.chinese: 聊了很多，我覺得進行得不錯。

sentences.english: We slid into a booth or we conversation picked up where it left off ago.
sentences.chinese: 咱們拐進了一家路邊小店，接着上次的話題聊了起來。

sentences.english: I feel uncomfortable during interviews because I need to talk about myself.
sentences.chinese: 在訪談中要聊自己，所以感覺很彆扭。

sentences.english: Can I talk to you in English?
sentences.chinese: 我能用英語和你聊幾句嗎？

sentences.english: While chatting, we found ourselves bopping to the music playing on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 聊天時，我們突然聽到收音機裏播放的音樂。

sentences.english: The old man rambles about the past.
The taxi driver is going on about new fuel cells coming out shortly.
sentences.chinese: 出租車司機在和我聊不久將投放市場的新型燃料電池。

sentences.english: While we were chatting, he slipped into bed.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在聊天時，他溜上牀睡覺去了。

definition: to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
erhua variant of 聊天[liao2 tian1]
to chatter idly/to gossip/to boast or brag
to talk endlessly/talking of anything under the sun
(Internet slang) awkward conversation/to have a cringeworthy conversation
